actions.name: ActivateGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to activate the gateway you previously deployed on your host

actions.name: AddCache
actions.description: Grants permission to configure one or more gateway local disks as cache for a cached-volume gateway

actions.name: AddTagsToResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to the specified resource

actions.name: AddUploadBuffer
actions.description: Grants permission to configure one or more gateway local disks as upload buffer for a specified gateway

actions.name: AddWorkingStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to configure one or more gateway local disks as working storage for a gateway

actions.name: AssignTapePool
actions.description: Grants permission to move a tape to the target pool specified

actions.name: AssociateFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an Amazon FSx file system with the Amazon FSx file gateway

actions.name: AttachVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to connect a volume to an iSCSI connection and then attaches the volume to the specified gateway

actions.name: BypassGovernanceRetention
actions.description: Grants permission to allow the governance retention lock on a pool to be bypassed

actions.name: CancelArchival
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel archiving of a virtual tape to the virtual tape shelf (VTS) after the archiving process is initiated

actions.name: CancelRetrieval
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel retrieval of a virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS) to a gateway after the retrieval process is initiated

actions.name: CreateCachediSCSIVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to create a cached volume on a specified cached gateway. This operation is supported only for the gateway-cached volume architecture

actions.name: CreateNFSFileShare
actions.description: Grants permission to create a NFS file share on an existing file gateway

actions.name: CreateSMBFileShare
actions.description: Grants permission to create a SMB file share on an existing file gateway

actions.name: CreateSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a snapshot of a volume

actions.name: CreateSnapshotFromVolumeRecoveryPoint
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a snapshot of a gateway from a volume recovery point

actions.name: CreateStorediSCSIVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to create a volume on a specified gateway

actions.name: CreateTapePool
actions.description: Grants permission to create a tape pool

actions.name: CreateTapeWithBarcode
actions.description: Grants permission to create a virtual tape by using your own barcode

actions.name: CreateTapes
actions.description: Grants permission to create one or more virtual tapes. You write data to the virtual tapes and then archive the tapes

actions.name: DeleteAutomaticTapeCreationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the automatic tape creation policy configured on a gateway-VTL

actions.name: DeleteBandwidthRateLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the bandwidth rate limits of a gateway

actions.name: DeleteChapCredentials
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials for a specified iSCSI target and initiator pair

actions.name: DeleteFileShare
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a file share from a file gateway

actions.name: DeleteGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a gateway

actions.name: DeleteSnapshotSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot of a volume

actions.name: DeleteTape
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified virtual tape

actions.name: DeleteTapeArchive
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS)

actions.name: DeleteTapePool
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified tape pool

actions.name: DeleteVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified gateway volume that you previously created using the CreateCachediSCSIVolume or CreateStorediSCSIVolume API

actions.name: DescribeAvailabilityMonitorTest
actions.description: Grants permission to get the information about the most recent high availability monitoring test that was performed on the gateway

actions.name: DescribeBandwidthRateLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to get the bandwidth rate limits of a gateway

actions.name: DescribeBandwidthRateLimitSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to get the bandwidth rate limit schedule of a gateway

actions.name: DescribeCache
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the cache of a gateway. This operation is supported only for the gateway-cached volume architecture

actions.name: DescribeCachediSCSIVolumes
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description of the gateway volumes specified in the request. This operation is supported only for the gateway-cached volume architecture

actions.name: DescribeChapCredentials
actions.description: Grants permission to get an array of Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials information for a specified iSCSI target, one for each target-initiator pair

actions.name: DescribeFileSystemAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description for one or more file system associations

actions.name: DescribeGatewayInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to get metadata about a gateway such as its name, network interfaces, configured time zone, and the state (whether the gateway is running or not)

actions.name: DescribeMaintenanceStartTime
actions.description: Grants permission to get your gateway's weekly maintenance start time including the day and time of the week

actions.name: DescribeNFSFileShares
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description for one or more file shares from a file gateway

actions.name: DescribeSMBFileShares
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description for one or more file shares from a file gateway

actions.name: DescribeSMBSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description of a Server Message Block (SMB) file share settings from a file gateway

actions.name: DescribeSnapshotSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the snapshot schedule for the specified gateway volume

actions.name: DescribeStorediSCSIVolumes
actions.description: Grants permission to get the description of the gateway volumes specified in the request

actions.name: DescribeTapeArchives
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description of specified virtual tapes in the virtual tape shelf (VTS)

actions.name: DescribeTapeRecoveryPoints
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of virtual tape recovery points that are available for the specified gateway-VTL

actions.name: DescribeTapes
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description of the specified Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of virtual tapes

actions.name: DescribeUploadBuffer
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the upload buffer of a gateway

actions.name: DescribeVTLDevices
actions.description: Grants permission to get a description of virtual tape library (VTL) devices for the specified gateway

actions.name: DescribeWorkingStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the working storage of a gateway

actions.name: DetachVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to disconnect a volume from an iSCSI connection and then detaches the volume from the specified gateway

actions.name: DisableGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to disable a gateway when the gateway is no longer functioning

actions.name: DisassociateFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Amazon FSx file system from an Amazon FSx file gateway

actions.name: JoinDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to enable you to join an Active Directory Domain

actions.name: ListAutomaticTapeCreationPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to list the automatic tape creation policies configured on the specified gateway-VTL or all gateway-VTLs owned by your AWS account

actions.name: ListFileShares
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the file shares for a specific file gateway, or the list of file shares owned by your AWS account

actions.name: ListFileSystemAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the file system associations for the specified gateway

actions.name: ListGateways
actions.description: Grants permission to list gateways owned by an AWS account in a region specified in the request. The returned list is ordered by gateway Amazon Resource Name (ARN)

actions.name: ListLocalDisks
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the gateway's local disks

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to get the tags that have been added to the specified resource

actions.name: ListTapePools
actions.description: Grants permission to list tape pools owned by your AWS account

actions.name: ListTapes
actions.description: Grants permission to list virtual tapes in your virtual tape library (VTL) and your virtual tape shelf (VTS)

actions.name: ListVolumeInitiators
actions.description: Grants permission to list iSCSI initiators that are connected to a volume

actions.name: ListVolumeRecoveryPoints
actions.description: Grants permission to list the recovery points for a specified gateway

actions.name: ListVolumes
actions.description: Grants permission to list the iSCSI stored volumes of a gateway

actions.name: NotifyWhenUploaded
actions.description: Grants permission to send you a notification through CloudWatch Events when all files written to your NFS file share have been uploaded to Amazon S3

actions.name: RefreshCache
actions.description: Grants permission to refresh the cache for the specified file share

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

actions.name: ResetCache
actions.description: Grants permission to reset all cache disks that have encountered a error and makes the disks available for reconfiguration as cache storage

actions.name: RetrieveTapeArchive
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an archived virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS) to a gateway-VTL

actions.name: RetrieveTapeRecoveryPoint
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the recovery point for the specified virtual tape

actions.name: SetLocalConsolePassword
actions.description: Grants permission to set the password for your VM local console

actions.name: SetSMBGuestPassword
actions.description: Grants permission to set the password for SMB Guest user

actions.name: ShutdownGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to shut down a gateway

actions.name: StartAvailabilityMonitorTest
actions.description: Grants permission to start a test that verifies that the specified gateway is configured for High Availability monitoring in your host environment

actions.name: StartGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to start a gateway that you previously shut down

actions.name: UpdateAutomaticTapeCreationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to update the automatic tape creation policy configured on a gateway-VTL

actions.name: UpdateBandwidthRateLimit
actions.description: Grants permission to update the bandwidth rate limits of a gateway

actions.name: UpdateBandwidthRateLimitSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to update the bandwidth rate limit schedule of a gateway

actions.name: UpdateChapCredentials
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials for a specified iSCSI target

actions.name: UpdateFileSystemAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update a file system association

actions.name: UpdateGatewayInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to update a gateway's metadata, which includes the gateway's name and time zone

actions.name: UpdateGatewaySoftwareNow
actions.description: Grants permission to update the gateway virtual machine (VM) software

actions.name: UpdateMaintenanceStartTime
actions.description: Grants permission to update a gateway's weekly maintenance start time information, including day and time of the week. The maintenance time is the time in your gateway's time zone

actions.name: UpdateNFSFileShare
actions.description: Grants permission to update a NFS file share

actions.name: UpdateSMBFileShare
actions.description: Grants permission to update a SMB file share

actions.name: UpdateSMBFileShareVisibility
actions.description: Grants permission to update whether the shares on a gateway are visible in a net view or browse list

actions.name: UpdateSMBLocalGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to update the list of Active Directory users and groups that have special permissions for SMB file shares on the gateway

actions.name: UpdateSMBSecurityStrategy
actions.description: Grants permission to update the SMB security strategy on a file gateway

actions.name: UpdateSnapshotSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to update a snapshot schedule configured for a gateway volume

actions.name: UpdateVTLDeviceType
actions.description: Grants permission to update the type of medium changer in a gateway-VTL
